mapper.insert: insert into biz(bsm_no,pass,bnum,type,company,email,ceo,phone,field,addr,reg_date) values(#{bsm_no},#{pass},(SELECT NVL(MAX(bnum)+1, 1) FROM biz),'B', #{company},#{email},#{ceo},#{phone},#{field},#{addr},to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select count(*) from biz where bsm_no=#{bsm_no}
